resources.string: Lorem Ipsum is a placeholder text used in the printing and printing industry. Lorem Ipsum has been considered the standard placeholder text since the sixteenth century, when an anonymous printer took a box of characters and assembled them to prepare a sample text. He survived not only more than five centuries, but also the transition to video layout, arriving substantially unchanged. It was popularized in the 1960s with the spread of the transferable "Letraset" character sheets, which contained passages from the Lorem Ipsum, and more recently from layout software such as Aldus PageMaker, which included versions of the Lorem Ipsum.
